content:
I'd be happy to help you find some deals or discounts on the skincare brand you're interested in.

Can you please tell me the name of the brand you're looking for? Additionally, do you have a specific product or range in mind that you're interested in purchasing?

Since you've already used a buy one get one free coupon on their website, I'll make sure to look for similar or even better deals for you.

Also, I'll check if they have any ongoing sales, promo codes, or loyalty programs that can help you save money on your next purchase.

Let me get started on that!
